alert.note: Alert for Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Weakley and northeastern Obion Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 930 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Fulton, or near Fulton, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Union City, Fulton, Dresden, South Fulton, Gleason, Sharon, Latham, Woodland Mills, Matheny Grove, Sandhill, Ore Springs, Hyndsver, Mount Pelia, Gibbs, Ruthville, Ralston, Shaffner, Terrell and McConnell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for west Tennessee.
